pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# Dash Ant Design Components

Ant Design components for Plotly Dash.## Installto install in your python environment.```shellpoetry add dash-antd```or via pip.```shellpip install dash-antd```## DevelopmentWe use [just](https://github.com/casey/just) as command runner, if you prefer not to installjust, have a look at the `justfile` for detailed commands.To manage python dependencies, we utilize [poetry](python-poetry.org/).### Getting StartedInstall python and node dependencies.```shjust install```Build the Dash packages.```shjust build```See all commands with `just -l`### Example appAn example app is contained in the `example` folder. To run it execute:```shjust run```
